htmlBody:
Here are some potentially helpful things I found:

  1. VIEW FUND DETAILS (digitalharbor.org) (I recommend looking into this one first)
  2. Effective Altruism Infrastructure Fund | Effective Altruism Funds
  3. Global Health and Development Fund | Effective Altruism Funds
  4. Early-Career Awards - Grant funding | Wellcome
  5. Job board | 80,000 Hours (80000hours.org) (Funding opportunities)
  6. Funding for researchers - Pandemic preparedness (thebritishacademy.ac.uk)
  7. Funding for researchers - Antimicrobial resistance (thebritishacademy.ac.uk)
  8. VIEW FUND DETAILS (gouvernement.fr)
  9. VIEW FUND DETAILS (mercatus.org)
  10. VIEW FUND DETAILS (leverhulme.ac.uk) (Deadline 22nd of February / DEADLINE TODAY)
  11. VIEW FUND DETAILS (website-files.com)
  12. VIEW FUND DETAILS (openphilanthropy.org)
  13. Open Philanthropy Course Development Grants | Open Philanthropy
  14. CLR Fund – Center on Long-Term Risk (longtermrisk.org)
  15. Research Grant Program (hsforms.com)

I hope this helps!
